title: 【1.8.x/1.7.X】【16x】SpookyJolicraft，萌风低配材质
author: WfiMan
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WfiMan 于 2016-2-12 15:20 编辑 

新人第一次发帖，其实内心是很方的截图来自官网，挂了也请告诉我。
（PS:谁能告诉我这么设置折叠？）
作者的话：（翻译无能……）
*I'm not able to upload to Planetminecraft right now, so for now to download you'll have to grab it from Jolicraft.com * 

This is an ADD-ON for the original Jolicraft meaning you must install it WITH Jolicraft, it's not stand-alone. In the resource packs screen be sure to arrange the order of the packs so that this is ABOVE the normal Jolicraft pack. Thanks to the one and only Braiden Neilson for helping get this ready for the most recent version of Mincraft. Enjoy! 

然后是搬运者的话：
看到论坛里有Jolicraft却没有SpookyJolicraft，就打算搬运了，上面那段话大约是有一个人帮助作者更新到1.8了



请有能力的朋友用原文网址支持作者，谢谢。
下载地址在上面。如果百度上面下载不了请告诉我。
